explains: n. 精神病学，精神病治疗学
wordGroup: forensic psychiatry 司法精神病学；法医精神病学

sentences.en: Srini Pillay, an assistant professor of psychiatry at Harvard Medical School, believes this counter-intuitive link between downtime and productivity may be due to the way our brains operate.
sentences.cn: 哈佛医学院精神病学助理教授斯里尼皮莱认为，停工期与生产力之间反常理的这种联系可能是我们大脑的运作方式导致的。

sentences.en: This is called negative symptom in psychiatry.
sentences.cn: 这在精神病学上被称作是阴性症状。

sentences.en: Psychology and psychiatry shouldn't be enemies.
sentences.cn: 心理学和精神病学不应该是敌人。
